summary: The untold story of 'bad-boy' Johnny Cash, his talented but troubled manager, Saul Holiff, and a son searching for his father in the shadow of a legend.
cast: Saul Holiff|Johnny Cash|Jonathan Holiff|Bob Dylan|Joaquin Phoenix|June Carter Cash|Reese Witherspoon|Harvey Glatt|Gary Holiff|David Disher|Joshua Robinson|Dan Champagne|Norman Singer|Elli Hollands|Alino Giraldi|Robert Skanes|Trevor Juras|Brent Crawford|Llyane Stanfield|Stephanie Crosby|Dawn Sadler|Nick Smyth|Nick Harauz|David Shuken|Rob Boitor|Jon Blair|Kevin Hurst|Adam Nicholson|Steve Megill|Bob Bratina|Gary Biggar|Antonino Rizzo|Andrew Besseling|Jarrod Schroll|Michael Pesce|Carol Potter|Beverly Carr|Steffi Black|Frank Carpenter|Chester Faulknor|Kelly Holiff|Nick Latimer|Brett Lefler|Vincent Molinaro|Murray Van Der Marel|Robert Watson|Michael Webster|Adam Weir|David James|Paul Ackerley|Jennifer Phillips|James Andrews|Barbara Holiff|Bruce Hayward|Myra Richman|Bill Haley|Phil Lortie|Pete Seeger|Nick Tracey|Billy Graham|Mark Inglis|Robert W. Brown
title: My Father and the Man in Black
